title: Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can log in successfully with valid credentials for all roles (admin, técnico, atendente).

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username and password for admin user.
Click on the login button.
Verify successful login and redirection to admin dashboard.
Logout from admin account.
Repeat login with valid credentials for técnico role.
Verify successful login and access to técnico functionalities.
Logout from técnico account.
Repeat login with valid credentials for atendente role.
Verify successful login and access to atendente functionalities.

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when invalid username or password is entered, and proper error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username and/or password.
Click the login button.
Verify login failure with appropriate error message displayed.

title: Password Recovery Flow
description: Verify that users can request password recovery and receive an email with reset instructions.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Click on 'Forgot Password' link.
Enter registered email address.
Submit the password recovery request.
Verify confirmation message about sent recovery email.
Verify receipt of password recovery email with reset link.

title: Authorization Role-based Access Control
description: Verify that users only access the features allowed by their roles and receive access denied if unauthorized.

steps.description: Login as técnico.
Attempt to access admin-only pages (e.g., user management).
Verify access denied or redirection occurs.
Login as atendente.
Attempt to edit orders of service that should be restricted.
Verify proper access control and restrictions.

title: Create New Service Order
description: Verify that a técnico or atendente can create a new order of service successfully.

steps.description: Login as técnico.
Navigate to 'Create New Order of Service' page.
Fill in valid data for client, equipment, service description, and assigned technician.
Submit the new order form.
Verify the order is created and listed in orders overview.
Check notification is sent via WhatsApp to the client.

title: Edit and Update Service Order Status
description: Verify that orders of service can be edited and their status updated with corresponding notifications.

steps.description: Login as técnico.
Open an existing service order.
Modify details such as description and update status to 'In Progress' or 'Completed'.
Save changes.
Verify changes are saved and reflected in order overview.
Verify client receives status update notification via WhatsApp.

title: Client Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify that admin users can create, read, update, and delete clients with correct data persistence.

steps.description: Login as admin.
Navigate to client management page.
Create a new client with all mandatory fields filled.
Verify client is added to list and data is correct.
Edit the client details.
Verify modifications persist.
Delete the client record.
Verify client is removed and no longer accessible.

title: Manage Technicians and Commissions
description: Verify that admin users can manage technicians and view commissions correctly calculated.

steps.description: Login as admin.
Navigate to technicians management page.
Add a new technician with required details.
Verify technician appears in list.
Check commissions page and verify commissions are calculated according to orders handled.

title: Payments Integration with Mercado Pago
description: Verify payments are processed correctly via Mercado Pago and financial records updated accordingly.

steps.description: Login as operador.
Navigate to payments section.
Initiate a payment for an order using Mercado Pago.
Verify payment is completed successfully and confirmation shown.
Verify financial records in the internal system reflect the payment.

title: Send WhatsApp Notifications
description: Verify that the system sends WhatsApp messages for notifications like order updates and reminders.

steps.description: Login as técnico or atendente.
Update order status triggering a notification.
Verify WhatsApp message is sent to the correct client phone number.
Create a new reminder message.
Verify reminder is scheduled and WhatsApp notification is sent at the appropriate time.

title: Dashboard Metrics and Financial Reports Accuracy
description: Verify that dashboard displays correct, updated metrics and financial reports reflect real data.

steps.description: Login as admin.
Navigate to dashboard page.
Verify key metrics such as number of orders, status distributions are accurate.
Navigate to financial reports and verify data matches expected payment and commission info.

title: Session Management and Validation
description: Verify session tokens are validated correctly and session expires after configured timeout.

steps.description: Login and verify session token is issued.
Perform some actions to validate session is active.
Verify access granted without re-login during active session.
Simulate session timeout or manual logout.
Verify session becomes invalid and user is redirected to login page on next action.

title: Protection Against SQL Injection
description: Verify that inputs do not allow SQL injection attacks and system handles malicious input safely.

steps.description: Attempt to submit forms with SQL injection strings in client or order fields.
Verify inputs are sanitized or rejected and no database errors or data leakage occur.

title: CORS Policy Enforcement
description: Verify that system accepts requests only from authorized domains and denies unauthorized cross-origin requests.

steps.description: Send requests from authorized domain and verify successful response.
Send requests from unauthorized domain.
Verify access denied or CORS error received.

title: System Responsiveness and UI Navigation
description: Verify the system's responsiveness on desktop, tablet, and mobile, including menu lateral and mobile navigation.

steps.description: Open the system on desktop browser and check layout and menu functionality.
Verify UI elements are correctly displayed and menu lateral works as expected.
Resize browser or open on tablet and mobile devices.
Verify the responsive menu appears and navigation remains intuitive on all screen sizes.

title: System Uptime and Performance
description: Verify system uptime meets 99.9% availability in production and response times for critical actions are under 2 seconds.

steps.description: Perform login, create order, update order, and payment transactions repeatedly.
Measure and confirm response times are within 2 seconds.
Simulate production load and measure system availability.
Verify uptime meets the 99.9% SLA.

title: Create and Manage Equipment Records
description: Verify that equipment can be added, edited, viewed, and deleted with accurate history tracking.

steps.description: Login as admin.
Navigate to equipment management page.
Add new equipment with complete details.
Verify equipment appears in list and data is saved correctly.
Edit equipment details.
Verify changes persist and history of services is visible.
Delete equipment and verify removal.

title: Financial Movements - Open, Close and Transactions in Cash Register
description: Verify that the operador can open and close cash register and record financial transactions accurately.

steps.description: Login as operador.
Open cash register for the day with initial balance.
Add financial movements including payments and withdrawals.
Verify movements are recorded and balances are calculated correctly.
Close cash register and verify final balance and report generation.

title: Notifications and Toast Messages Verification
description: Verify that user receives real-time toast notifications for actions such as order updates, payment confirmation, errors, and reminders.

steps.description: Perform actions like creating an order, editing an order, or processing a payment.
Verify toast messages appear with correct content and disappear after timeout.
Trigger error scenarios such as invalid form submission.
Verify error toast notifications are displayed appropriately.
